name: cardshop-api
description: This API uses a PostgreSQL database, here are the instructions on how to initialize the project once PostgreSQL is installed locally.

scripts.test: set ENV=test && db-migrate --env test up && jasmine-ts && db-migrate --env test down && db-migrate --env test down && db-migrate --env test down
scripts.refresh-test: db-migrate --env test down && db-migrate --env test down && db-migrate --env test down
